dialogue.name: Maya's Curiosity
lines: So what do you think about this whole trial business? Does it really help your incarnation?

dialogue.name: Qyvnily Enthusiasm
lines: Oh yes! We learn SO much from feeling your feelings, and the trials heighten them quite nicely.
*heavy breathing, just a bit of drool*

To overcome the trials, you must consider feelings as well. Even bloodlusting tree monsters have them. Listen for the song of the lost Treantwives and you may clutch his heart in your grippy little primate grabbers!
